summary:
Potions that restore health, magicka or stamina will restore these stats over 15 seconds instead of having an instant effect.

>> And this works with ALL potions, including the ones you kinky alchemists craft! <<
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=yellow][size=8][center]Potions Restore Over Time[/center][/size][/color][/b]

[b][color=yellow]Overview[/color][/b]
Potions that restore health, magicka or stamina will restore these stats over 15 seconds instead of having an instant effect.

>> And this works with ALL potions, including the ones you kinky alchemists craft! <<

[b][color=yellow]Compatibility[/color][/b]
Compatible with anything that don\'t change healing, stamina or magicka potions effect.

Check my other MOD if you want to see yourself drinking a potion whenever you use one: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28114]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28114[/url]

Steam Workshop link: [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=89104848]http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=89104848[/url]
author: Manaflow
